categories: Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Conference of Uncommitted Worlds (0 ABY), held on Kabal just after the Battle of Yavin, was a gathering where Princess Leia Organa secured a commitment by Silver Fyre to aid the Rebellion. Fyre's deputy commander, Kraaken, secretly alerted the Empire to the conference, resulting in an assault on Kabal by TIE Bombers.
